test_scenario: Check agent automatically run when the device restarts

steps.action: Press “Win + E” keys, open File Explorer, go to the folder where “cmdextension.msi” locates
In file explorer, click on “File -> Open Windows PowerShell -> Open Windows PowerShell as administrator”
Wait 1 minute, and restart the device
Press “Win + R” keys, type “services.msc” and press Enter.
steps.expected: Verify “Microsoft Cloud Managed Desktop Extension” - Status is “Running”, Startup Type is “Automatic”, and Log On As is “Local System”.

steps.action: Open file explorer, go to %ProgramData%\Microsoft\CMDExtension\Logs. Open “CMDExtension.log”
steps.expected: Verify there are at least 2 lines of “Start up args length: 0” in the log.

steps.action:
Test Cleanup:

In the same powershell window as “Step 3”, run command: msiexec /x cmdextension.msi
